item.title: Go as a River
item.description: Notes #natural-history#historical-fiction four corners monument ‚ÄùMan flooded the town of Iola; now nature is bringing back its ghost‚Äù by The Los Angeles Times racism & bigotry women‚Äôs suffering against bigotry, sacrifices and grief Quotes pg 7: I knew the town of Iola when it woke each morning to fragrant breakfasts and bustling farms and ranches, how the sunrise illuminated the east side of Main then inched uptown, across the train tracks and schoolyard, to ignite the tiny church's one round red and blue stained glass window.

item.title: The Tales of Genji

item.title: my tiny internet
item.description: Hello internet wanderer, you have stumbled to my public garden of thought. This abode is messy, chaotic and probably would not make much sense to a stranger but it is where I explore, prune and gather my curiosities into an interconnected map.

item.title: clean(er) energy
item.description: producing and processing bits and bytes (in the digital world) still requires atoms (in the physical world). more technology means generating and consuming more energy.

item.title: battery energy
item.description: battery energies are moving from lithium-ion to solid-state batteries, they are a form of new energy away from fossil fuels, clean(er) energy different batteries technologies: solid-state batteries (i.

item.title: Rokuon-ji Temple, Kyoto
item.description: renamed rokuon-ji but eventually became known as kinkaku-ji 1894: temple was opened to public to help it financially in 1894 in 1950, temple was burnt down by a young monk, hayashi yoken.

item.title: Lombok, Indonesia
item.description: lombok strait: south of lombok, near kuta places to go/went **& experienced mana yoga, ashtanga yoga sore full moon soundbath yoga bat cave, mawan beach mt rinjani trekking lanne beach / pantai selong belanak for beginner surfing secret gilis tour - gilli naggu, gilii kedis and gili sudak at south-west lombok (!!! very beautiful beaches and cerulean blue waters) loose observations tourism as main income.
